description.en:
Bitcoin SV - is a new coin splitted of Bitcoin Cash blockchain on 15 November 2018.
Four fundamental pillars form the basis of Bitcoin SVâ€™s roadmap to create the one blockchain for the world: stability, scalability, security, and safe instant transactions (a.k.a 0-confirmation).
The Bitcoin SV project was created at the request of and sponsored by Antiguan-based CoinGeek Mining, with development work initiated by nChain. The project is also owned by the Antiguan-based bComm Association on behalf of the global BCH (SV) community, and the Bitcoin SV code is made available under the open source MIT license.
